ComicInfo.Title: When the Witch Doctor Strikes! Chapter One: The Coming of Warroo!; Warroo Part 2 Man Versus Magician; Trail's End!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Kid Colt escapes from the sheriff and tries to hide with his friends among the Comanche.
Kid Colt discovers the secret behind Warroo.
When Sheriff Jess Sawyer retires his brother learns the true meaning of wealth.
Two-Gun Kid has to defend himself from folks looking to gain a reputation by out-drawing him.
